question: In which State is the Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development located?
explanation: The Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development, Sriperumbudur, Tamil Nadu, is an Institution of National Importance by the Act of Parliament No. 35/2012 under the Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports, Government of India. The RGNIYD was set up in 1993 under the Societies Registration Act, XXVII of 1975.
